entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who stayed in his comfortable job instead of going to Azkaban. He is described as having a hint of impatience for the first time.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as a person who shows signs of interrupting Snape and seems to be questioning his actions.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who protected Snape from going to Azkaban. He is also described as having a stooge.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as someone who did not know whether he could trust Snape and was in a pitiful condition.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as the place where Death Eaters were being rounded up.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a group that was being rounded up by the Ministry.

relationships.description: Snape is protected by Dumbledore from going to Azkaban.
The Dark Lord did not trust Snape and thought he had turned into a stooge for Dumbledore.
